description: Chart component exposed as named export instead of default.
Version 16.8.0 or greater is now required for both react and react-dom
Minimum typescript version increased to ^3.8.0 (due to import type). Meaning in case typescript is used, ensure that the version is 3.8.0 or greater

The ‘label’ property of PieChart can no longer be a boolean or ReactElement. Instead of label = true, we recommend using label = {({ dataEntry }) => dataEntry.value}. Except for this change the label property now also works just like [render properties](https://reactjs.org/docs/render-props.html), meaning you also no longer need the ‘dataIndex’ property to access the data of the label. For an example of the new way to access the data see https://github.com/toomuchdesign/react-minimal-pie-chart/blob/v8.2.0/stories/index.tsx#L81-L139
